analysis.key_quote: Indeed, it is obvious to anyone that the current administration is covertly hiring personnel in think tanks - for example, the group behind Project 2025 - instead of doing the work the administration itself is supposed to do, thereby putting this administration, and the United States government under obligation to outside parties in violation of the anti-deficiency act.
analysis.rationale: The comment expresses concerns about the integrity and quality of the proposed rule, suggesting it undermines the merit-based system and raises issues of politicization by involving outside parties in the rulemaking process.
